story_00_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Hey there, friend!
Welcome to the world of Pokémon Masters!
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I’m Blue!
I’m a pretty big deal around here.
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: But enough about me. Tell me about you!
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
So your name’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
That’s got a nice ring to it.
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], buckle up,
because there’s a huge team tournament 
right around the corner.
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
The Pokémon Masters League!
Or PML, for short.
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It’s one big festival for Pokémon Trainers like us.
Trainers from all over the world gather to form 
teams of three and battle it out!
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Each Trainer can only use one Pokémon, 
though, so the real challenge is how well 
your team works together!
story_00_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
We’re gonna meet so many awesome Trainers
here! It’s kind of crazy to think about.
I know I’m excited!
story_00_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Well then, off we go! 
To the world of Pokémon Masters!
